note.p: Estonian nobleman. Also known as Gottlieb Wilhelm Reinhold von Rosen. Younger brother of Hans Robert Otto Frederick de Rosen. Married Gertrude Rigby (1812–59), a cousin of Maria Hooker, Joseph Dalton Hooker’s mother, in Framingham Earl, Norfolk, in 1831.
Genealogisches Handbuch der baltischen Ritterschaften Estland 1 pt 2: 224–5
Norfolk, England, Church of England marriages and banns, 1754–1936 (Ancestry.com, accessed 18 August 2022)
